text: Warren Mitchell (born Warren Misell; 14 January 1926 - 14 November 2015) was a British actor. He was a BAFTA TV Award winner and twice an Olivier Award winner. He was known for his role as Alf Garnett in the BBC television sitcom Till Death Us Do Part (1965â€“75). Mitchell died, in the early hours of 14 November 2015, after long period of illness, aged 89. He is survived by his wife Connie and their three children: Rebecca, Daniel (also an actor) and Anna (also known as Georgia Mitchell). ==References== ==Other websites== * *Screenonline: Warren Mitchell *TimeOut: Warren Mitchell Category:1926 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from London Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:People from the London Borough of Hackney
title: Warren Mitchell
